MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Behavioral Inhibition and Approach System

References:
Strobel, A., Beauducel, A., Debener, S., & Brocke, B. (2001). Eine deutschsprachige Version des BIS/BAS-Fragebogens von Carver und White. Zeitschrift f√ºr Differentielle und diagnostische Psychologie. Doi: 10.1024//0170-1789.22.3.216
Carver, C. S., & White, T. L. (1994). Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation, and affective responses to impending reward and punishment: the BIS/BAS scales. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 67(2), 319-333. doi: 10.1037/0022-3514.67.2.319

Assessing:
'... dispositional BIS [behavioral inihibition system] and BAS [behavioral activation system] sensitivities' (Carver and White, 1994, page 319)
